Q_DESC:
To write a program in which the user has to input number of elements and enter elements into a singly linked list.
Now the user has to input two integers M and N. Traverse the linked list such that you retain M nodes then delete next N nodes, continue the same till end of the linked list.
INPUT:
7 //number of elements
11 //first element
22 //second element
33 //third element
44 //fourth element
55 //fifth element
66 //sixth element
77 //seventh element
2 //M
2 //N
OUTPUT:
M = 2, N = 1 
Given Linked list is :
77 66 55 44 33 22 11 

Linked list after deletion is :
77 66 44 33 11
TESTCASE_1:
7 11 22 33 44 55 66 77 2 1
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
M = 2, N = 1 
Given Linked list is :
77 66 55 44 33 22 11 

Linked list after deletion is :
77 66 44 33 11
